note: Ned's great-grandfather was Thomas Lamont, the chairman of J.P. Morgan, the legendary Wall Street investment bank.
title: An effective campaign and blog enthusiasm aren't Lamont's only assets. He also happens to be filthy rich. There's nary a log cabin dangling from the Lamont family tree

The businessman dealt with potholes and town budgets for two years as a Greenwich selectman from 1987-89. He also spent six years on the town's Board of Estimate and Taxation from 1989-95. His experience comes mostly from the business world: His company, Lamont Digital Systems, wires college campuses for cable television
